website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive choice for customers seeking a simple, low-maintenance fruit picker.
pros: Fabric prevents bruising as fruit falls into net
Extremely lightweight when compared with other models
Netting is 8 inches deep for efficient harvesting
cons: A few buyers wished the basket was larger

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I got tired of the previous fruit picker that left metal shards in my hands and punctured the fruit. This is a much gentler system. Only negative was having to get the pole. Prefect for the home gardener.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mcclellan

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: We have a lime tree in our yard when we bought this house. The lime tree has sticker spikes that really hurt when you try to pick a lime with your hand. Also, the birds tend to get to some of the limes before we do. This picker, attached to a telescopic pole, helps me pick limes so the ones the birds get into and that are still on the limb, I can take them down. I guess if you like limes you can pick some to eat them. I don't and this is how I do maintenance on that pesky lime treat. Why couldn't it have been a mango tree.
customer_reviews.author: waterbaby

customer_reviews.title: I have a peach tree, it really doesnt get ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a peach tree, it really doesnt get hold of the fruit to them to drop into the basket. The fruit rolls right over the top of the metal brackets...
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Damschen

customer_reviews.title: Fruit picker
customer_reviews.text: The rounded prongs are great and do not puncture fruit like a hooked picker does.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Arrived partially completed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a small bag with a piece of metal. The small bag can't pick more than 2 orange. I emailed the seller and was asked to put them together. Seller was willing to refund half of money. I don't have proper tool to do that. Finally, the seller refund me the total amount.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wu

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 decision on buying this good tool small small bag bad
customer_reviews.text: The bag is small and not good quality the tool is what we need here in Hawaii but the mangos are bigger than the tool and the bag maybe holds one
customer_reviews.author: Michael Joseph O'loughlin

customer_reviews.title: Light duty fruit picker
customer_reviews.text: This is a light duty picker. It fit perfectly on a tapered rake handle I had laying around. The shipping took so long I forgot I ordered this. But for personal picking this is nice. The fingers will bend so take it easy when using.
customer_reviews.author: US4

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Straightforward, Holds Up
customer_reviews.text: Product did what it was supposed to do. It picked apples. The tines bend a little easier than I'd like, but they bend back just as well. Overall good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Seida

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, you need your own stick, though and screw it on, otherwise it will fall on your head.
customer_reviews.author: H. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The product I got is not the same as in the photo
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware - this product is not the same as it used to be. The handle is now placed in a totally different position so the item cannot be used in the same way. Also the metal part is no longer circular - it is an oval which makes it hard for fruit to fit. I tried to return and the seller offered me a 5% refund??? Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: marinmom3

customer_reviews.title: Fruit Ninja
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so i can take my neighbors fruit (w/permission). You need your stick. The fruit just goes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zia & Jacob

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit the pole that it said it would. But we cobbled it together. Haven't used it yet, but I think it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: kalina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Attached it to a rake handle, and relatively easily pick apples from the top of the tree.
customer_reviews.author: HERO

customer_reviews.title: Fruit picker
customer_reviews.text: After I installed it on a long pole, and sharpened the metal 'valley's', it's awesome @
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Good for apples!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great!!! I have used it for apples and pawpaws, and have picked LOADS this fall. Super product. Metal part looks indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Rhubarb

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took time to get here from China but the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Fruit picker
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed to pick fruit of the trees. I fixed the basket to a long pole now can reach the apples,lemons,oranges and other fruit from the ground . Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Picker did not work well.  It would not grab the fruit.  Also, cloth came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Picker did not work well. It would not grab the fruit. Also, cloth came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: RadioMan

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it appears on the site. Sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Not good for more than 25 Apple picks.
customer_reviews.text: No way of attaching to pole without going to the hardware store. Tabs bent right away.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Roe

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Great for reaching fruit high up in the tree with an extension pole.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rosinski

customer_reviews.title: can't give this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Very small not worth the money took too long to receive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Swapped out the bag for a bigger one. Other than that, great product
customer_reviews.author: Maez

customer_reviews.title: Works on figs
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Only wish it came with an attachable pole. Good value. Works with figs.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda H Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I was dumb not to realize that this doesn't come with the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Natelly Leam

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: Best device ive ever bought. Ive had many types and bought this model for my lemon tree, mango, guava, and peach tree amd it works perfect. 11/10 quality is great
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It really does pull my pears off the tree easily.
customer_reviews.author: JRI

customer_reviews.title: Great picker but without handle
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it was a bit painful to get the right sized handle for it.
customer_reviews.author: spzahner

customer_reviews.title: took forever to get here
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price but took a long time to get here
customer_reviews.author: Nakamura2Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fruit picker with basket - needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: This fruit picker arrived in a plastic bag as its packaging. When it arrived some of the teeth were bent. It is constructed of fairly thin gauge metal. Also - the exterior of the metal had some blue vinyl on top which was sewn into the bag - making it impossible to remove all of it. Since this was very inexpensive, I'll be forgiving and give it 4 stars. For its intended purposes (picking apples in branches too high for me to reach by hand), it should serve well. This is just the picker - you will need to purchase your own handle for attaching. I've included some photos that I hope will be helpful for other shoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Photographer James Falkofske

customer_reviews.title: Not good for picking frui
customer_reviews.text: Great product until I picked and avocado. Cloth and avo fell a long way. May work well for picking small flower or air plants.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great reacher.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for getting pears out of the (massive) feral trees in the forest around my house, first time I was able to get them before the animals. And they were most excellent pears, great for apples too of course. The metal teeth really take the fruit off the branch nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Felzer

product_meta.title: STARRICH Fruit Picker Head Basket or Fruit Picking Tools, Fruits Catcher for Harvest Picking Apple Citrus Pear Peach, etc
product_meta.description:
Description

This is an useful garden tool which easy to pick fruits without ladder.The pull style Fruit Picker Basket is lightweight and can fit any Handle with an easy to use screw tightened band.
It can saved time and efforts, and don' worry about to pick those friuts that are at the top. Perfect for picking apple, peach, pear, orange, etc. 

Specifications

Material: Stainless steel + Purified cotton
Picker Diameter: Appr 15cm / 5.91"
Space between teeth: Appr. 1.5cm / 0.5"

Package Included

1 x Fruits Picking Tool (handle/pole is not included)
feature_bullets: ★ Fruit picker is an useful tool which make it possible for picking fruits without climbing a ladder, no fruit or tree damage.
★ This picking basket tool just like a Fishing Net for fruit, Easy to use, very convenient and practical for fruit picking.Great tool for orchard workers.
★ Slim, lightweight, convenient and labor saving, very practical Use the teeth of the ring to cut fruit down and gather them in the fruit picker bag.
★ Fruit picking head only (pole is not included), suitable for home, orchard, park, farm, garden, etc.
★ Fruits catcher tool size: Diameter: 5.51 inch; Depth of bag: 7.87 inch; Weight:6.4 oz.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars87 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
